Metadata.title: Devotel Smart Insurance Portal
Metadata.description: Apply for insurance and manage your applications

InsuranceForm.title: Apply for Insurance
InsuranceForm.error: An error occurred while submitting the form
InsuranceForm.selectInsuranceType: Please select an insurance type to continue
InsuranceForm.stateSelectionNote: Note: State selection is not required for home insurance
InsuranceForm.fireSafetyNote: Note: If you select "Yes" for having fire safety measures, you must select at least one of the following options: Smoke Detectors, Fire Extinguishers, or Sprinkler System.
InsuranceForm.genderNote: Note: Gender selection is not provided by the backend form. As per assignment requirements, this field will be set to N/A by default.
InsuranceForm.requiredOptionsNote: Note: Due as required in the Backend form structure, you must select all of the following options to proceed to submission!

SubmissionsList.title: Your Applications
SubmissionsList.warningTooltip: Click to learn more about local submissions
SubmissionsList.warningMessage: Due to backend limitations, your submissions are stored locally in your browser. This means they will only be visible on this device and will be cleared if you clear your browser data. The server data shown is for demonstration purposes only.
SubmissionsList.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this submission? This action cannot be undone.
